review: It works great and seems to load quickly.  Watched a few Netflix programs and it never paused to buffer the program.  My only complaint is with Amazon Prime.  I understand some of it is out Amazons control but some older shows on Prime still cost money to watch but on Netflix they are free, other than your monthly fee.  I paid for a year of Prime.  Like I said its my only complaint.
author: Amazon Customer

review: The interface is a little clunky and takes one or two extra clicks to get to content compared to AppleTV.  But there is a ton of content available if you put some time in to dig through the available APs. Can't beat it for the price!
author: Wayne Welch

review: Great new tool for my tv!
author: Danny S

review: Works as advertised.Good Parts: The included cable adapter was really handy on a TV with an oddly placed HDMI port.Less Good: For a little stick, needing to attach the included power adapter was a surprise. They should be more forthcoming in the marketing.
author: Shawn Turner

review: Love it!!  We out it in every room and now getting rid of cable
author: Aly

review: good product no issues so far works smoothly no streaming issues. i would recommend it.
author: rayray

review: The Fire Stick was the easiest electronic device I've ever set up on an electronic device that I've ever owned! Really! I'm A prime member so it came pre registered and all I needed was a password for the wifi, everything just worked, kinda like Apple and iOS!
author: Havasuman
